Open source OpenInviterTM (Open InviterTM) is a free import contacts (addressbook) script from email providers like Azet, India, Freemail, Atlas, Lycos, OperaMail, Plaxo, Techemail, Evite, Rediff, Nz11, GMX.net, Care2, Clevergo, Meta, MSN, Virgilio, Xing, Yahoo!, Walla, Mail.com, YouTube, Popstarmail, Doramail, Mynet.com, Rambler, IndiaTimes, Yandex, Apropo, Kids, Hushmail, Grafitti, KataMail, Bigstring, O2, Bordermail, Mail.in, Interia, Canoe, Mail2World, Sapo.pt, Terra, Mail.ru, FastMail, Uk2, Gawab, Zapakmail, LinkedIn, Wp.pt, Abv, Web.de, Inet, Live/Hotmail, Aussiemail, 5Fm, Pochta, GMail, AOL, Netaddress, Inbox.com, Libero or social portals like MySpace, Orkut, Eons, Konnects, Famiva, Tagged, Flixster, Fdcareer, Plazes, Mycatspace, Mevio, Brazencareerist, Xuqa, Multiply, Kincafe, Vimeo, Facebook, Koolro, Friendster, Cyworld, Flingr, Motortopia, Bebo, Hyves, Hi5, Last.fm, Livejournal, Twitter, Bookcrossing, NetLog, Lovento, Badoo, Plurk, Mydogspace, Faces, Meinvz, Vkontakte, Friendfeed, Ning, Perfspot, Flickr, Xanga, Skyrock. This contacts importer script is integrating with content management systems (aka CMS) like Social Engine, phpizabi, JamRoom, Buddy Zone, PunBB, Etano, Joomla1.0, nowFire, Boonex Dolphin, vBulletin, Vwebmail, joovili, SimpleMachines Forum (SMF), myBB, symfony, Joomla, E107, phpFoX, RoundCube, Social Engine 4, PhpBB, jamit job, Wordpress, Dating Pro, Drupal, PHPMELODY, Atmail5. Open Inviter is written in PHP 5 (no database required but cURL or wget required) and running on any webserver (tested on Apache) offering advanced tell a friend features. OpenInviterTM is a free self hosted solution that does not use a third party gateway (or API) to import contacts.Download it at: OpenInviter
